selected_quotes: This manuscript was a labor of love that's been 3+ years in the making. SO good to have it in the world.
Outstanding new work on #mentoring. Must read! #MedEd
On mentoring women surgeons: Kudos @AmaliaCochranMD @LeighNeumayer @UofUHealth women leading opening doors
One of our medical school's favorite attending physicians work. Awesome stuff
Altruism an important component of effective mentoring
